title: Driver.San.Francisco.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Driver.San.Francisco.Repack-R.G.Mechanics







Release Info:


Year: 2011
Genre: Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Ubisoft Reflections
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus| Multi6
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: PROPHET




System Requirements:


Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium D processor with a clock frequency of
3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 X2 4400+ with a clock frequency of 2.2 GHz
Memory: 1 GB (XP) / 2 GB (Vista / 7)
Video: 256 MB compatible with DirectX, shaders 4th model
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 6.6 GB


Game information:


Continuation of the famous series of racing action, which
sold around the world sold over 14 million copies.
Crime boss Charles Jericho was released, and the tranquility
of San Francisco came to an end. Only one man can resist mothers
mafia. Anyone who has traveled the streets of hundreds of cities,
hunting for criminals. He knows that the deal with Jericho will
not be easy and it may be his last job. His name is John Tanner.
He - the driver.



Game Features:

Playing a movie. Feel the excitement of the indomitable car chase!
Spectacular slip, long drifts, sharp turns and high speed maneuvering
in heavy traffic vehicles: Ã‚Â«Driver: San Francisco" on entertainment is
not inferior to the best kinoblokbasteram. Behind the wheel of each of
more than hundreds of licensed cars you feel
like a hero Hollywood blockbuster.

Endless hunting. Become a protagonist extremely topical stories! Your
hero - Detective Tanner, relentlessly pursuing the well-known mafia
Jericho. Believe me, he has personal reasons for hatred. He had to
survive in this crazy race to San Francisco and take revenge.

The car - one detective. Miraculously surviving after a terrible
car accident, Tanner has found a unique ability to Shift, which allows
instantaneous travel from one machine to another. Instantly change the
car during the chase to a quick, strong or powerful. It is possible that
you may even be able to take control of enemy vehicles.

Oh, dear you open more than two hundred kilometers of roads gorgeous San
Francisco. You will pass over the bridge, "Golden Gate" and see all the
sights and the famous beauty of this magnificent city. Moving from one
machine to another, you can look at the metropolis with a variety of angles.
Raging traffic. Compete with other drivers in the nineteen dynamic
multiplayer modes! Shift function allows you to time in the right place.
Play with your friends over a network or on a split screen.

Repack Features:

Driver: San Francisco
Game Version - v1.04
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
